about_the_game:
Breath of Space is an action-packed video game that combines elements of third-person shooter, rogue-lite, and roguelike genres. The game is set in the vast Aegea Space Mining Facility, where you will have to battle against various threats and unlock upgrades to progress further. However, there's a catch - your robotic companion carries your save file, and if it dies, all your progress will be lost. So, you need to be vigilant and keep your companion alive to keep your progress intact.

ROGUELIKE OR ROGUE-LITE

Your playstyle in the game affects how your robotic companion, Nefes, behaves when it dies. You can choose between three stances for Nefes, and the riskier the stance you choose, the stronger Nefes becomes. However, the more aggressive your playstyle, the higher the chance of losing all progress. If Nefes dies, your progress will reset when you die, so be careful!

AEGEA SPACE MINING FACILTY

Embark on a journey through a vast space mining facility, where every chamber presents unique trials and opportunities. Make use of a diverse range of upgrades, resources, and modifications to navigate through the game, adapting to the evolving challenges that await you. As you delve deeper into the facility, the stakes increase, offering greater rewards but also greater risks.

STORY

Venture on a dangerous mission as a Space Agent in Breath of Space. Aegea Space Mining Facility, a beacon of hope for the confederation's prosperity is invaded by the unknown. But when the facility is attacked and Uzay's father, a key figure, disappears, you're sent on a risky mission to reclaim it. Like the other agents, you'll face tough challenges and fail to succeed in the mission.
Explore unknown areas, battle tough enemies, and decide the fate of the confederation. Can you save the facility and uncover the secrets your father left behind? The story is in your hands in this thrilling adventure.

FEATURES

Rebirth Mechanic: Experience an innovative rebirth system where defeat is only a beginning. Harness the power of Nefes, your companion droid, to rise again and push your limits, unlocking new abilities and strategies.
Dynamic AI Companion: Command Nefes in three distinct modes – Passive, Support, and Aggressive. Adapt on the fly, utilizing Nefes' versatile skills to tackle challenges in your own style.
Resource Management: Navigate the fine line between risk and reward with the "Qouise" resource system. Decide whether to invest in temporary upgrades for your current run or deposit resources for permanent advancements, shaping your long-term strategy.
Strategic Upgrades: Customize Uzay's journey with a wide array of suit upgrades, weapon enhancements, and Nefes modifications. Strategically combine these elements to create unique playstyles and overcome the challenges that lie ahead.
Immersive Aegean Universe: Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted world inspired by the United Aegean Confederation. Explore a harmonious blend of cultures, cuisines, and architecture as you uncover the secrets of a divided yet interconnected universe.
